name: MinecraftAdmin
author: Maximilien Bersoult

sections.description:
MinecraftAdmin is for manage and display information of Minecraft server.

This plugins work with Minecraft server craftbukkit : http://www.bukkit.org.
The plugins server use is :

  • Whitelist : http://forums.bukkit.org/threads/587/
  • Remote Toolkit : http://forums.bukkit.org/threads/674/
  • TCP Bukkit : http://forums.bukkit.org/threads/746/
  • Permissions : http://forums.bukki.org/threads/5974/

Feature :

  • Manage user with Whitelist
  • Display status of manager RemoteToolkit (Widget)
  • Display status of server (Widget)
  • Display user connected (Widget)
  • Manage permissions by groups with Permissions

Please backup your permissions files before using the modules.
sections.installation: Upload the plugin to your blog and activate it. Then, follow the instructions
sections.faq:
How to configure Whitelist bukkit plugins ?

Go to the documentation page :
http://code.google.com/p/wp-minecraftadmin/wiki/Documentation

I find a bug, how to report the bug ?

Go to the issues page :
http://code.google.com/p/wp-minecraftadmin/issues/list

Search if the bug is not already report.
Report the bug ( http://code.google.com/p/wp-minecraftadmin/issues/entry )

I have a new request or I would manage a new bukkit module

Use the issues page :
http://code.google.com/p/wp-minecraftadmin/issues/list

0.4.1

0.4.0

  • Add Permission by groups (work with user in Whitelist)

0.3.0

  • First release
